Sample applications available at https://github.com/visioforge/.Net-SDK-s-samples .

Please add VisioForge.DotNet.Core.Redist.VideoCapture.x86 or VisioForge.DotNet.Core.Redist.VideoCapture.x64 or both to your project.

Check deployment to find which feature require more packages - https://www.visioforge.com/vcsdknet-deployment

Changelog - https://github.com/visioforge/.Net-SDK-s-samples/blob/master/changelog.md .
